info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MIFFLIN... SOUTHEASTERN CENTRE...NORTH CENTRAL JUNIATA AND SOUTHWESTERN SNYDER COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Lewistown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Milroy, Mcalisterville, McClure, Beaver Springs, Spring Mills, Coburn, Troxelville, Alfarata, Belltown, Snyder-Middleswart State Park, Seven Mountains, Poe Valley State Park, Reeds Gap State Park, Wagner and Siglerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
